src:
Dear Milenial, UMP Naik Mending Cicil Rumah Yuk!
06 Nov 2019, 10:56 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Luthfy S

Jakarta - Kenaikan upah minimum provinsi (UMP) 2020 telah diumumkan pada 1 November 2019 lalu. Kenaikan UMP ini bisa jadi peluang bagi para milenial untuk mulai mencari hunian idamannya. Dengan kenaikan UMP ini, pembelian properti diprediksi akan meningkat di tahun 2020."Pertumbuhan itu juga saya yakin akan naik di tahun 2020 karena UMP sekarang naik juga. Dan itu akan memberikan dampak bagus sekali," jelas Country Manager Rumah123.com Maria dalam Festival Properti Indonesia di Mal Kota Kasablanka, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Maria mengatakan, dengan naiknya UMP maka masyarakat punya pendapatan yang berlebih. Harapannya, masyarakat tak lebih konsumtif, tapi mengalokasikan gajinya untuk berinvestasi ke properti."Karena masyarakat pendapatannya akan berlebih dari yang sebelumnya. Dan harapannya mereka tidak lebih konsumtif, karena kan masyarakat Indonesia dengan gaji lebih besar cenderung gaya hidup lebih tinggi, harapannya kenaikan UMP akan memberikan ruang untuk masyarakat membeli rumah," kata Maria.Oleh karena itu, pihaknya menggelar Festival Properti Indonesa (FPI) tahun 2019. Dalam festival ini, Rumah123.com menggaet 26 developer yang memberikan sejumlah penawaran menarik.Mulai dari rumah dengan uang muka atau down payment (DP) Rp 0, cicilan mulai Rp 2 juta-an per bulan, gratis biaya Bea Perolehan Hak atas Tanah dan Bangunan (BPHTB), Akta Jual Beli (AJB), dan provisi bank. Lalu, di FPI ini pengunjung bisa mendapatkan subsidi rumah puluhan juta."Di FPI ini kita memberikan banyak meudahan, mulai dari pembeliannya, pembayarannya. Bahkan ada DP yang cuma Rp 0. Jadi kalau ditanyakan apa, ya sudah pasti pemilihan rumahnya banyak, begitu juga dengan apartemen, condotel. Dengan pilihan payment-nya juga, cara belinya juga banyak, dan hadiahnya banyak. Jadi semua bisa didapatkan di sini," ujar Maria.Dalam kesempatan yang sama, General Manager Marketing Rumah123.com Fanny Meiliana menuturkan, nantinya, pengunjung yang bertransaksi properti dalam festival ini pun bisa mendapatkan cashback hingga Rp 100 juta."Kenapa kita kasih cashback? Karena biasanya habis beli rumah kan uang kita tersedot habis-habisan. Nah ketika ada cash back itu bisa dimanfaatkan si pembeli sesuai kebutuhan masin-masing2. Apakah untuk mengisi rumahnya, atau jalan-jalan, dan lain-lain," terang Fanny.Dalam FPI ini, properti yang ditawarkan memiliki keragaman harga. Untuk apartemen sendiri, harganya dimulai dari Rp 290 juta sampai Rp 3 miliar. Untuk rumah tapak ditawarkan mulai dari Rp 300 juta hingga Rp 3 miliar.Adapun developer yang turut mempromosikan propertinya di FPI 2019 ini di antaranya Metland, Trans Park, Paradise Serpong City, Synthesis Homes, dan sebagainya.Simak Video "Asyik! UMP Tahun 2020 Naik 8,51%"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)
text:
Dear Millennial, UMP Goes to Install the Installment of a House!
06 Nov 2019, 10:56 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Luthfy S

Jakarta - An increase in the provincial minimum wage (UMP) 2020 was announced on November 1, 2019. The increase in the UMP can be an opportunity for millennials to start searching for their ideal dwellings. With this increase in UMP, property purchases are predicted to increase in 2020. "I believe that growth will also increase in 2020 because the UMP is now rising as well. And that will have a very good impact," explained Country Manager Rumah123.com Maria in the Property Festival Indonesia at the Mall of Kasablanka City, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Maria said, with the increase in the UMP, the community had excess income. The hope is that the community will not be more consumptive, but will allocate their salary to invest in property. "Because the community will have more income than before. And their hope is that they are not more consumptive, because Indonesians with higher salaries tend to have higher lifestyles, they expect the UMP increase will be higher. provide space for people to buy a house, "said Maria. Therefore, it held the Indonesian Property Festival (FPI) in 2019. In this festival, Rumah123.com hooked 26 developers who gave a number of attractive offers. Starting from home with down payments or down payment (DP) of Rp. 0, installments starting from Rp. 2 million per month, free of charge for the acquisition of land and building rights (BPHTB), Deed of Sale and Purchase (AJB), and bank provisions. Then, in this FPI, visitors can get tens of millions of home subsidies. "In this FPI we provide a lot of facilities, starting from the purchase, payment. There is even a DP which is only Rp 0. "With an apartment, a condotel. With payment options as well, how to buy too much, and a lot of prizes. So all can be obtained here," said Maria. On the same occasion, General Manager of Rumah123.com Marketing House Fanny Meiliana said, later, visitors those who transact property in this festival can get cashback of up to Rp. 100 million. "Why do we give cashback? Because we usually spend our houses completely sucked out of money. Now when there is cash back, the buyer can use it according to their individual needs. "Is it to fill his house, or a walk, etc.," explained Fanny. In this FPI, the offered property has a variety of prices. For the apartment itself, the price starts from Rp. 290 million to Rp. 3 billion. Landed homes are offered ranging from Rp. 300 million to Rp. 3 billion. As for developers who have also promoted their properties in FPI 2019 including Metland, Trans Park, Paradise Serpong City, Synthesis Homes, and so on. Watch Video "Fun! UMP Year 2020 Up 8.51% "[Gambas: 20sec video] (fdl / fdl)
